pullrequest.title: Update Visual's get/set functions and add unit tests

content.raw: +1. [This inheritance diagram](http://osrf-distributions.s3.amazonaws.com/gazebo/api/dev/classgazebo_1_1rendering_1_1Visual.html) shows that Visual has many subclasses, many of which do not have SDF associated with them. It's not the fault of this PR, however, since it doesn't add the SDF member, just the accessor for it. A SetSDF function here would be far more problematic. Maybe there even needs to be a distinction between the C++ interface for the SDF Visual element and the class that acts as an interface to the rendering library...
content.html: +1. This inheritance diagram shows that Visual has many subclasses, many of which do not have SDF associated with them. It's not the fault of this PR, however, since it doesn't add the SDF member, just the accessor for it. A SetSDF function here would be far more problematic. Maybe there even needs to be a distinction between the C++ interface for the SDF Visual element and the class that acts as an interface to the rendering library...
